cn.trackName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
cn.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/
5.生辰App 软件协议与隐私政策
生辰 软件许可及服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-agreement/
生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

cn.description:
「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

cn.releaseNotes: 我们会尽可能频繁地更新应用程序，以使其更快、更可靠。
cn.description:
我的足迹MyTracks是一款通过使用GPS数据来记录您的位置的应用程序。它非常适合徒步旅行、慢跑、散步、骑行等各种活动。这款应用程序利用先进的技术提供精确的测量和计算。

以下是您可以使用MyTracks做的事情：
记录您的路线：无论您是徒步旅行、慢跑还是骑行，MyTracks都可以记录您的路径并在地图上显示。
保存收藏的位置：如果有特定的地点您想要记住，您可以将它们标记为应用程序中的收藏夹。
导入和导出数据：MyTracks允许您以多种格式导入和导出数据，如CSV、GPX、KML和KMZ。
提高准确性：您可以进行静态GPS观测，以获得更准确的路标。
轻松导航：该应用程序在指南针上提供路标指南，让您轻松导航到特定位置。
可定制的路标：您可以手动添加路标，也可以从您的收藏位置导入。您甚至可以添加具有角度和距离的矢量。
坐标转换：MyTracks允许您随时在四种不同的坐标格式（十进制、度分秒、MGRS、UTM）之间进行转换。
其他功能：该应用程序在记录过程中显示滑翔比，提供度数或千分度的指南针选项，支持地图上的MGRS网格叠加，并允许您在开始跟踪之前创建路线。
详细记录：您可以在地图上查看您的轨迹并重播路线。该应用程序提供有关您的轨迹的详细统计信息，并显示与每个轨迹相关联的已保存路标。您还可以更改轨迹的颜色以便更容易识别。

请注意，持续在后台使用GPS会快速消耗设备的电池。如果您喜欢我们的应用，请分享好友给予我们支持！如果您有任何反馈或问题，请随时通过miaozhi.ai@gmail.com与我们联系。

cn.description:
Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging — all in a smart, simple-to-use app. 

USERS SAY…

The best
Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it!

LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP
Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!!

Fast, intuitive, user friendly
I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription.

RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE
• Ranked #1 in Forbes Health’s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025.
• Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine.
• Praised by The New York Times as “simpler, quicker, and better-looking” than other apps.
• Featured in Today’s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom.

DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS
• Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads.
• Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless.
• Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy.
• Privacy Focused: No account required.

MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world.

PROVEN SUCCESS
• Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week
• Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps

A few of the free version features:
• Easy food, exercise, and water tracking.
• Daily coaching tips and meal reminders.
• Customizable dashboard for your goals.
• iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support.
• Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos.

SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES
• Up to 108 nutrients tracked
• Plan macros
• Full set of charts
• Timestamps
• Carb tracking

If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find:

• Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback.
• Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols.
• Macros planning and cycling.
• Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos.
• Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition.
• Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings.
• In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet.

Subscription Terms:
The subscription period will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

● 150 個精心設計的關卡

hk.description:
60 Seconds! is a dark comedy atomic adventure of scavenge and survival. Collect supplies and rescue your family before the nuke hits. Stay alive in your fallout shelter. Make difficult decisions, ration food and hunt mutant cockroaches. And maybe survive. Or not.

60 Seconds! requires at least an iPhone 5, iPad 3, or iPad mini 2.

As Ted, a responsible citizen and a family man, you are faced with a slight disturbance to your happy, suburban lifestyle. THE NUCLEAR APOCALYPSE.

With only 60 seconds left to impact, guide Ted in a mad, intense and action packed dash through his house in search of his family and useful supplies. Everything will be against you - time, your very own furniture, the house that's different every time you play and the fundamental question - what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time and alive is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

EXPERIENCE
the suburbian nightmare of a nuke dropping down on your neighbourhood in this atomic, dark comedy set in 1950s.

SCAVENGE
any supplies, you will need to survive, and family members in a 60 second rush through your randomly generated house.

PREPARE
for the worst. Don’t just grab arbitrary items, plan your survival and follow helpful tips from emergency broadcasts!

SURVIVE
in a fallout shelter with whatever you brought with you. How many days will you last? Will everyone make it out alive?

DECIDE
what to do, when the post-apocalyptic world pushes you to the corner. Will you risk going outside? Who is not eating dinner, when barely any food is left? How do you deal with a mutant cockroach infestation?

hk.description:
想像一個神奇的工廠正出現在您的客廳。精心策劃的傑作，在這裏，勤奮的工人將客戶想要的一切匯集在一起。可以用衆多不同的材料製造橡皮鴨和梳妝台、無人駕駛飛機和電吉他、踏板車和其他精美的商品，並以現金出售 – 您將現金投資回工廠，以獲得更多機器、更多工人並發展業務。您在Little Big Workshop中成為工廠大亨！

真正的工廠 - 充滿樂趣
您是大老闆，現在是時候負責您自己的桌面工廠了。組織工廠車間，管理您的工人，購買機械並設計高效的生產線 - 所有這些都在規定期限內完成，並讓您的客戶滿意！ 

開放式沙盒體驗
放輕鬆，這是一個沙盒體驗游戲，您可以在其中思考、衡量和鑽研事物，直到它們按照您想要的方式工作。當您生產超過50種獨特的產品類型（由多個零件和零件製成）時，向客戶和不斷變化的市場供應產品 - 所有這些都可以用不同的材料和生產方法來製造。沒有兩個工廠看起來相同。

小小手，大夢想
從一個小作坊開始，然後擴展到佈滿桌子的工廠。解鎖更先進的機器，增加更多的生產方法，還有最重要的，增加空間。很快，您將運行多條生產線，每天生產成百上千的先進產品，並欣喜地觀看可愛的工人完成實際工作。

特點：
- 各種各樣的行業和廣泛的產品
- 側重於實際問題，而不是價值、經濟或物流
- 在藍圖上組織生產的所有步驟
- 隨著您解鎖更多的辦公桌空間，工廠將發展
- 全面模擬的日/夜週期
- 照顧好您的工人！如果使他們太辛苦地工作，他們會像蒼蠅一樣墜落
- 可愛的模型城鎮藝術風格

hk.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

hk.description:
我的足跡MyTracks是一個使用GPS數據來追蹤您位置的應用程式。它非常適合各種活動，如徒步旅行、慢跑、散步、騎自行車等等。這款應用程式利用先進的技術提供精確的測量和計算。

以下是您可以使用MyTracks進行的操作：
追蹤您的路線：無論是徒步旅行、慢跑還是騎行，MyTracks都能夠記錄您的路徑並在地圖上顯示。
保存喜愛的位置：如果有特定地點您想要記住，您可以在應用程式中將其標記為喜愛的位置。
匯入和匯出數據：MyTracks允許您以CSV、GPX、KML和KMZ等多種格式匯入和匯出數據。
提高準確性：您可以進行靜態GPS觀測，以獲得更準確的路標。
輕鬆導航：該應用程式在指南針上提供路標導航，讓您輕鬆導航到指定位置。
可自訂的路標：您可以手動添加路標，或從喜愛的位置中導入路標。您甚至可以添加具有角度和距離的向量。
座標轉換：MyTracks允許您隨時在四種不同座標格式（十進制、度分秒、MGRS、UTM）之間進行轉換。
其他功能：該應用程式在錄製過程中顯示滑翔比，提供度數或千分度的指南針選項，支援地圖上的MGRS網格疊加，並允許您在開始追蹤之前創建路線。
詳細記錄：您可以在地圖上查看您的追蹤軌跡並重播路線。該應用程式提供有關您的軌跡的詳細統計信息，並顯示與每個追蹤相關的已保存路標。您還可以更改追蹤的顏色以便更容易識別。

請注意，持續在背景使用GPS會快速耗盡設備的電池。如果您喜歡我們的應用，請分享好友給予我們支持！如果您有任何回饋或問題，請隨時透過miaozhi.ai@gmail.com與我們聯繫。

hk.description:
《鬼谷八荒》是一款開放世界的沙盒修仙遊戲。結合了修仙體系與山海經文化背景，體驗從凡人一步步修行成長為強者的過程，與山海經中各種妖、獸戰鬥。你是否能堅守本心，與困難做鬥爭；慎做抉擇，把握自己的命運。
【遁入修仙世界，開啟逆天人生】  
鬼谷八荒，除了財侶法地，還有詭祕莫測的妖獸，危機重重的秘境，難以逾越的天塹，彩光四射的祕寶，等著被人發現。  
你將作為一個煉氣期小修士從愚村出發，修煉，變強，危機中九死一生。每一次突破，你都能逆天改命，助你在旅途上披荊斬棘，跨越五大州，睥睨天下，再闖上天元山，向天道一問。  

【AI互動生態，給NPC完整的一生】  
我們構建了完整的NPC互動生態，他們「生活」在這裡，有自己的朋友親族關係網，自己的人生軌跡，不受玩家的進度限制，除非，你決定出手干涉。  
你可兼濟天下，攜手紅顏；你可獨善其身，快意恩仇；你亦可逆天而行，與全世界為敵。  
和NPC們切磋武藝，傳授道心，拜師學藝，收徒授業。和NPC在拍賣場喊價廝殺，結束後拔刀相向或順手牽羊。你將成為修仙界群像中的一部分，是大放異彩，還是默默修行，皆看你如何選擇。  

【體驗小說橋段，感受奇遇驚喜】  
英雄救美？愛人為你爭風吃醋？五十年之約？捲入神秘組織的明爭暗鬥？遺蹟遇寶？又慘遭奪寶？  
這些都有可能發生在你身上。  
除NPC交互之外，這裡還有豐富的隨機事件以及支線任務，在你的旅途上給予驚喜。它們或許會讓你煩惱，餵你刀子，也可能讓你化險為夷，甚至破而後立。在一步又一步的選擇過程中，你將譜寫只屬於你的，獨一無二的故事。  

【打造最強宗門，攻城略地一統八荒】  
我們構建了宗門的經營玩法，身為弟子、長老以及宗主，將會有不同的體驗。你可以加入大宗門，從最底層的弟子做起，一步步爬上權力的階梯。也可以空降落魄的小宗門，力挽狂瀾，帶領宗門重振雄風。  
弟子可以完成宗門任務，在宗門大比中出戰，或隨同門出征作戰，為宗門積累資源，為宗門贏取榮譽，為宗門擴張土地。  
長老可以管轄門下弟子，傳道授業，分配任務職能，加速宗門成長，在宗門大戰中指導弟子大殺四方。  
宗主則需要統籌全宗的秩序，制定侵略和防守計劃，攻防靈礦等資源點，甚至佔領他人宗門，奪取專屬逆天改命和祕籍。  
一統八荒，只要你有宏圖壯志和鐵腕手段，不再只是幻想。  

【構築獨特流派，挑戰妖獸神仙】  
闖蕩這世界，需要有傍身之技。  
心法築根基，武技/靈技探深淺，身法創機會，絕技造優勢，神通定乾坤。不同祕籍有不同的特性。  
修仙者還有十二大靈根，對應不同的流派，你可以選擇專精一路，或全面發展。十二種靈根都有對應的功法祕籍，排列組合可組成豐富的流派，孰強孰弱，皆由你評斷。  
城鎮琅琊閣、宗門功法閣、秘境、各種任務，甚至路邊一個土坑裡，都可能發現珍奇祕籍，充滿驚喜。  
這個世界上還有上百種珍奇妖獸，無數修仙者、鬼怪、仙人供你檢驗自己的實力。挑戰升仙擂台，衝擊各大洲參玄榜，以此證明自己的實力。你能否踏破冥山的障礙一路向前？構築的流派能否經歷大浪淘沙的檢驗？  

【法寶器靈煉丹畫符，三大神器伴前路】  
練好自身本領，也別忘了外力加持。  
開局三大神器，每一個都會給你帶來一種獨一無二的系統。雙魚佩可以復活自己和選中之人，昊天眼可以偷學妖獸技能，洞察更多訊息，而煉妖壺則可以讓你捕獲BOSS成為你的小跟班，替你戰鬥或派遣尋求寶物。  
除了開局神器之外，你也能煉製你自己的法寶，並收服器靈與你一起戰鬥，此外器靈還會在探索中給予你陪伴，觸發專屬的奇遇等等。  
在這裡，你還可以學習煉丹畫符、堪輿風水，製作幫助你探索世界、整蠱仇人、戰鬥殺敵的種種道具。至於如何發揮它們真正的作用，皆看各位道友如何抉擇。

mo.description:
《瘟疫公司》是一個非常真實的策略模擬類游戲。 
您的病原體剛剛感染了“零號病人”。現在您必須適應這個世界，不停改進病原體的傳染力和抵抗力，以便應對人類的反擊措施，最終進化成一個全球性的恐怖瘟疫。
這是為iPhone和iPad設計的全新遊戲，保證將游戲（和您）的標準一同推向更高境界。這是您和全世界的競爭- 唯有強者才能生存！

◈◈◈全球頂尖的手機遊戲◈◈◈ 

《瘟疫公司》是一款極受全球玩家歡迎的策略型遊戲。遊戲獲得近百萬個五星級評價，同時被多家媒體爭相報導，包括經濟學人、紐約每日新聞、衛報、倫敦地鐵和波士頓先驅報等等！
《瘟疫公司》的創辦人更曾獲美國疾病控制預防中心邀請出席在亞特蘭大舉辦的座談會，來分享遊戲內的疾病模型！
 “《瘟疫公司》使用一條非傳統路線來提高公眾對流行病學、疾病傳播和流行疾病信息的意識。”- 美國疾病控制與預防中心
▶ “2012年最佳平板遊戲”- 紐約每日新聞
▶“《瘟疫公司》會在所有方面吸引並保持您的注意力。”- Touch Arcade
▶“《瘟疫公司》的確是一個高質量的遊戲。”- Modojo
▶“《瘟疫公司》真的非常精彩！” London Metro
▶“毀滅全世界的同時又不乏趣味性。”- Pocket Lint
▶“《瘟疫公司》太讓人上癮了！” - Slide to Play
▶ 2012年年度“最佳策略遊戲獎”- Pocket Gamer
▶“殺死幾十億人從未如此有趣過。”- IGN

◈◈◈ 

遊戲特點：
● 出色的Retina顯示與高質量的界面相結合
● 使用超強人工智能技術設計，以更細緻、更真實地模擬現實世界。
● 完整的遊戲功能說明與幫助內容
● 12種病原體，毀滅世界的策略各有不同！ ● 完整的保存/載入遊戲功能 ● 超過50個國家，上百種性狀和上千種世界事件等您去發掘。 ● 完全支持成就係統和排行榜。 ● 更新版本新增了能夠精神上控制人類的Neurax蠕蟲、能夠製造殭屍的Necroa病毒、急速通關模式和多種劇情模式！ ● 工作室目前已依次增加了對簡體中文、英語、德語、西班牙語、葡萄牙語、意大利語、法語、日語、韓語和俄語的支持。 （我們還會陸續增加更多語言！）

「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

mo.description:
60 Seconds! is a dark comedy atomic adventure of scavenge and survival. Collect supplies and rescue your family before the nuke hits. Stay alive in your fallout shelter. Make difficult decisions, ration food and hunt mutant cockroaches. And maybe survive. Or not.

60 Seconds! requires at least an iPhone 5, iPad 3, or iPad mini 2.

As Ted, a responsible citizen and a family man, you are faced with a slight disturbance to your happy, suburban lifestyle. THE NUCLEAR APOCALYPSE.

With only 60 seconds left to impact, guide Ted in a mad, intense and action packed dash through his house in search of his family and useful supplies. Everything will be against you - time, your very own furniture, the house that's different every time you play and the fundamental question - what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time and alive is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

EXPERIENCE
the suburbian nightmare of a nuke dropping down on your neighbourhood in this atomic, dark comedy set in 1950s.

SCAVENGE
any supplies, you will need to survive, and family members in a 60 second rush through your randomly generated house.

PREPARE
for the worst. Don’t just grab arbitrary items, plan your survival and follow helpful tips from emergency broadcasts!

SURVIVE
in a fallout shelter with whatever you brought with you. How many days will you last? Will everyone make it out alive?

DECIDE
what to do, when the post-apocalyptic world pushes you to the corner. Will you risk going outside? Who is not eating dinner, when barely any food is left? How do you deal with a mutant cockroach infestation?

mo.description:
想像一個神奇的工廠正出現在您的客廳。精心策劃的傑作，在這裏，勤奮的工人將客戶想要的一切匯集在一起。可以用衆多不同的材料製造橡皮鴨和梳妝台、無人駕駛飛機和電吉他、踏板車和其他精美的商品，並以現金出售 – 您將現金投資回工廠，以獲得更多機器、更多工人並發展業務。您在Little Big Workshop中成為工廠大亨！

真正的工廠 - 充滿樂趣
您是大老闆，現在是時候負責您自己的桌面工廠了。組織工廠車間，管理您的工人，購買機械並設計高效的生產線 - 所有這些都在規定期限內完成，並讓您的客戶滿意！ 

開放式沙盒體驗
放輕鬆，這是一個沙盒體驗游戲，您可以在其中思考、衡量和鑽研事物，直到它們按照您想要的方式工作。當您生產超過50種獨特的產品類型（由多個零件和零件製成）時，向客戶和不斷變化的市場供應產品 - 所有這些都可以用不同的材料和生產方法來製造。沒有兩個工廠看起來相同。

小小手，大夢想
從一個小作坊開始，然後擴展到佈滿桌子的工廠。解鎖更先進的機器，增加更多的生產方法，還有最重要的，增加空間。很快，您將運行多條生產線，每天生產成百上千的先進產品，並欣喜地觀看可愛的工人完成實際工作。

特點：
- 各種各樣的行業和廣泛的產品
- 側重於實際問題，而不是價值、經濟或物流
- 在藍圖上組織生產的所有步驟
- 隨著您解鎖更多的辦公桌空間，工廠將發展
- 全面模擬的日/夜週期
- 照顧好您的工人！如果使他們太辛苦地工作，他們會像蒼蠅一樣墜落
- 可愛的模型城鎮藝術風格

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
mo.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

mo.releaseNotes: 我們會儘可能頻繁地更新應用程式，以使其更快、更可靠。
mo.description:
我的足跡MyTracks是一個使用GPS數據來追蹤您位置的應用程式。它非常適合各種活動，如徒步旅行、慢跑、散步、騎自行車等等。這款應用程式利用先進的技術提供精確的測量和計算。

以下是您可以使用MyTracks進行的操作：
追蹤您的路線：無論是徒步旅行、慢跑還是騎行，MyTracks都能夠記錄您的路徑並在地圖上顯示。
保存喜愛的位置：如果有特定地點您想要記住，您可以在應用程式中將其標記為喜愛的位置。
匯入和匯出數據：MyTracks允許您以CSV、GPX、KML和KMZ等多種格式匯入和匯出數據。
提高準確性：您可以進行靜態GPS觀測，以獲得更準確的路標。
輕鬆導航：該應用程式在指南針上提供路標導航，讓您輕鬆導航到指定位置。
可自訂的路標：您可以手動添加路標，或從喜愛的位置中導入路標。您甚至可以添加具有角度和距離的向量。
座標轉換：MyTracks允許您隨時在四種不同座標格式（十進制、度分秒、MGRS、UTM）之間進行轉換。
其他功能：該應用程式在錄製過程中顯示滑翔比，提供度數或千分度的指南針選項，支援地圖上的MGRS網格疊加，並允許您在開始追蹤之前創建路線。
詳細記錄：您可以在地圖上查看您的追蹤軌跡並重播路線。該應用程式提供有關您的軌跡的詳細統計信息，並顯示與每個追蹤相關的已保存路標。您還可以更改追蹤的顏色以便更容易識別。

請注意，持續在背景使用GPS會快速耗盡設備的電池。如果您喜歡我們的應用，請分享好友給予我們支持！如果您有任何回饋或問題，請隨時透過miaozhi.ai@gmail.com與我們聯繫。

mo.description:
《鬼谷八荒》是一款開放世界的沙盒修仙遊戲。結合了修仙體系與山海經文化背景，體驗從凡人一步步修行成長為強者的過程，與山海經中各種妖、獸戰鬥。你是否能堅守本心，與困難做鬥爭；慎做抉擇，把握自己的命運。
【遁入修仙世界，開啟逆天人生】  
鬼谷八荒，除了財侶法地，還有詭祕莫測的妖獸，危機重重的秘境，難以逾越的天塹，彩光四射的祕寶，等著被人發現。  
你將作為一個煉氣期小修士從愚村出發，修煉，變強，危機中九死一生。每一次突破，你都能逆天改命，助你在旅途上披荊斬棘，跨越五大州，睥睨天下，再闖上天元山，向天道一問。  

【AI互動生態，給NPC完整的一生】  
我們構建了完整的NPC互動生態，他們「生活」在這裡，有自己的朋友親族關係網，自己的人生軌跡，不受玩家的進度限制，除非，你決定出手干涉。  
你可兼濟天下，攜手紅顏；你可獨善其身，快意恩仇；你亦可逆天而行，與全世界為敵。  
和NPC們切磋武藝，傳授道心，拜師學藝，收徒授業。和NPC在拍賣場喊價廝殺，結束後拔刀相向或順手牽羊。你將成為修仙界群像中的一部分，是大放異彩，還是默默修行，皆看你如何選擇。  

【體驗小說橋段，感受奇遇驚喜】  
英雄救美？愛人為你爭風吃醋？五十年之約？捲入神秘組織的明爭暗鬥？遺蹟遇寶？又慘遭奪寶？  
這些都有可能發生在你身上。  
除NPC交互之外，這裡還有豐富的隨機事件以及支線任務，在你的旅途上給予驚喜。它們或許會讓你煩惱，餵你刀子，也可能讓你化險為夷，甚至破而後立。在一步又一步的選擇過程中，你將譜寫只屬於你的，獨一無二的故事。  

【打造最強宗門，攻城略地一統八荒】  
我們構建了宗門的經營玩法，身為弟子、長老以及宗主，將會有不同的體驗。你可以加入大宗門，從最底層的弟子做起，一步步爬上權力的階梯。也可以空降落魄的小宗門，力挽狂瀾，帶領宗門重振雄風。  
弟子可以完成宗門任務，在宗門大比中出戰，或隨同門出征作戰，為宗門積累資源，為宗門贏取榮譽，為宗門擴張土地。  
長老可以管轄門下弟子，傳道授業，分配任務職能，加速宗門成長，在宗門大戰中指導弟子大殺四方。  
宗主則需要統籌全宗的秩序，制定侵略和防守計劃，攻防靈礦等資源點，甚至佔領他人宗門，奪取專屬逆天改命和祕籍。  
一統八荒，只要你有宏圖壯志和鐵腕手段，不再只是幻想。  

【構築獨特流派，挑戰妖獸神仙】  
闖蕩這世界，需要有傍身之技。  
心法築根基，武技/靈技探深淺，身法創機會，絕技造優勢，神通定乾坤。不同祕籍有不同的特性。  
修仙者還有十二大靈根，對應不同的流派，你可以選擇專精一路，或全面發展。十二種靈根都有對應的功法祕籍，排列組合可組成豐富的流派，孰強孰弱，皆由你評斷。  
城鎮琅琊閣、宗門功法閣、秘境、各種任務，甚至路邊一個土坑裡，都可能發現珍奇祕籍，充滿驚喜。  
這個世界上還有上百種珍奇妖獸，無數修仙者、鬼怪、仙人供你檢驗自己的實力。挑戰升仙擂台，衝擊各大洲參玄榜，以此證明自己的實力。你能否踏破冥山的障礙一路向前？構築的流派能否經歷大浪淘沙的檢驗？  

【法寶器靈煉丹畫符，三大神器伴前路】  
練好自身本領，也別忘了外力加持。  
開局三大神器，每一個都會給你帶來一種獨一無二的系統。雙魚佩可以復活自己和選中之人，昊天眼可以偷學妖獸技能，洞察更多訊息，而煉妖壺則可以讓你捕獲BOSS成為你的小跟班，替你戰鬥或派遣尋求寶物。  
除了開局神器之外，你也能煉製你自己的法寶，並收服器靈與你一起戰鬥，此外器靈還會在探索中給予你陪伴，觸發專屬的奇遇等等。  
在這裡，你還可以學習煉丹畫符、堪輿風水，製作幫助你探索世界、整蠱仇人、戰鬥殺敵的種種道具。至於如何發揮它們真正的作用，皆看各位道友如何抉擇。

tw.description:
Apple 年度最佳應用程式 Day One，全球下載次數超過 1,500 萬次，獲得 200,000 次 5 星評價，徹底改變了寫日記的方式，讓你記錄生活中的點點滴滴。  在全球最值得信賴的數位日記中安全地儲存音訊、影片、照片、筆記等其他內容。

「Day One 創造珍貴的回憶，近乎完美：完全隱密的數位空間。」 –《紐約時報》

「Day One 讓寫日記變得輕鬆愉快。」 – 《連線》

「這款優異的日記應用程式賞心悅目、簡單好用，讓競爭對手難以超越。」–《Macworld》

為什麼選擇 Day One？

Day One 是原創日記應用程式。十年來持續更新並增添功能，打造全球最隱密、最值得信賴，也最好用的日記平台。

簡單好用，讓人著迷

• 獲獎設計，美觀大方
• 無限文本條目
• 無限量照片和影片*
•強大的 RTF 文字格式與 Markdown
• 記錄生活點滴的全新方式*

私密又安全

• 自動備份，妥善保護日記條目
• 端對端加密，100% 確保日記隱密
•透過密碼或 TouchID 保障日記條目安全
•提供多種匯出選項 (pdf、純文字、JSON 等)，確保日記條目永遠歸你所有

養成並保持習慣

•可設定的提醒通知
• 每日不重覆的日記提示，消除你的撰寫障礙
•可自訂範本讓你省下時間，並讓版面看起來井井有條
• 今日檢視讓你快速查看今天去過哪些地方、做了哪些事

隨時隨地寫日記

• 跨平台應用程式，可在 iPhone、Apple Watch、iPad 和 Mac 上使用
• 可透過電子郵件直接傳送條目到日記中

專為記錄回憶打造

• 「在這一天」功能讓你重溫過往回憶
• 標籤、我的最愛和搜尋篩選條件讓你輕鬆找到所需內容
• 「地圖檢視」讓你快速查看已記錄的所有地點

*Day One 是款提供使用者永久免費使用的應用程式，完全不限條目數量。 Day One Premium 會員另可享有無限量照片、影片及同步功能。 立即開始免費試用。

隱私權政策：https://dayoneapp.com/privacy-policy/

使用條款：https://dayoneapp.com/terms-of-use/

如需技術協助或有其他問題，請前往：https://dayoneapp.com/contact/

tw.description:
Track calories, food, and macros with ease! MyNetDiary has a free barcode scanner, personal diet plans, and AI Meal Scan for instant logging — all in a smart, simple-to-use app. 

USERS SAY…

The best
Love this app! The best out of many food tracking apps that I have tried over the years. Love that it is free! The breakdown of the meal and daily nutrition is very informative. Try it you will love it!

LOVE LOVE LOVE THIS APP
Best app for tracking food, exercise! Consistently losing weight! I love how it shows you if you're on target for your goal. Great layout, great look, easy to use!!! I highly recommend this app if you're looking to be a healthier you!!!

Fast, intuitive, user friendly
I have tried other calorie tracking programs over the years and this app is by far the best I've come across. I highly recommend it. The free version is very good and I am now enjoying the extra functions through a paid subscription.

RECOGNIZED EXCELLENCE
• Ranked #1 in Forbes Health’s Best Weight Loss Apps of 2025.
• Rated #1 by the American Journal of Preventive Medicine.
• Praised by The New York Times as “simpler, quicker, and better-looking” than other apps.
• Featured in Today’s Dietitian, alongside WW and Noom.

DIFFERENT FROM OTHER DIET APPS
• Simple & Generous Features: Packed with free tools, no ads.
• Lightning-Fast Logging: Barcode scanner and AI Meal Scan make tracking effortless.
• Verified Food Database: Over 1.7 million items with 108 nutrients for accuracy.
• Privacy Focused: No account required.

MyNetDiary puts you in control. You can pick a diet or a meal plan, follow our registered dietitians' easy tips, and follow the app's guidance. Or, you can turn them off and simply use MyNetDiary as the best free calorie-counting app in the world.

PROVEN SUCCESS
• Active members lose an average of 1.4 lbs/week
• Over 25 million users have chosen MyNetDiary, many switched from other diet apps

A few of the free version features:
• Easy food, exercise, and water tracking.
• Daily coaching tips and meal reminders.
• Customizable dashboard for your goals.
• iOS Health integration and Apple Watch support.
• Shopping lists, nutrition articles, and how-to videos.

SPECIAL PRO APP FEATURES
• Up to 108 nutrients tracked
• Plan macros
• Full set of charts
• Timestamps
• Carb tracking

If you need more support, MyNetDiary Premium provides all the guidance and features you may need. At your fingertips, you'll find:

• Premium Diets, 600+ full-flavored Premium Recipes and Menus by RDs, including low-carb, keto, high-protein, Mediterranean, vegetarian, and more - with diet planners, guides, and feedback.
• Intermittent fasting - full-featured, with fasting timer and different protocols.
• Macros planning and cycling.
• Planning and tracking up to 108 nutrients, including omegas and aminos.
• Recipe import tool - easily load internet recipes and calculate complete nutrition.
• Integrations with top fitness trackers - Fitbit, Garmin, and Withings.
• In-depth reporting and analysis tools to improve your diet.

Subscription Terms:
The subscription period will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period. To turn this function off, turn off auto-renew in your iTunes account. Renewal payments will differ depending on subscription and pricing at the time of renewal. Your iTunes account will be charged when the purchase is confirmed.

Privacy Policy: www.mynetdiary.com/privacy.html
Terms of Use: www.mynetdiary.com/terms.html

關於此遊戲：
《地城謎蹤》是一款考驗玩家 2D 空間邏輯和技能運用的解謎遊戲，你可以用劍打倒身旁的怪物、用弓箭攻擊遠處的敵人、用盾牌推動障礙物、甚至可以用手套拉動怪物改變他的位置。

此遊戲總共有 150 個精心設計的關卡，玩家必須要充分了解遊戲的機制才能順利過關。

而若要達成進階目標，則需要針對解法進行最佳化，有的時候甚至要拋棄原本的解法，重新以不同角度去觀察和思考才能達成。

● 地城+解謎+倉庫番
● 150 個精心設計的關卡

tw.description:
60 Seconds! is a dark comedy atomic adventure of scavenge and survival. Collect supplies and rescue your family before the nuke hits. Stay alive in your fallout shelter. Make difficult decisions, ration food and hunt mutant cockroaches. And maybe survive. Or not.

60 Seconds! requires at least an iPhone 5, iPad 3, or iPad mini 2.

As Ted, a responsible citizen and a family man, you are faced with a slight disturbance to your happy, suburban lifestyle. THE NUCLEAR APOCALYPSE.

With only 60 seconds left to impact, guide Ted in a mad, intense and action packed dash through his house in search of his family and useful supplies. Everything will be against you - time, your very own furniture, the house that's different every time you play and the fundamental question - what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time and alive is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

EXPERIENCE
the suburbian nightmare of a nuke dropping down on your neighbourhood in this atomic, dark comedy set in 1950s.

SCAVENGE
any supplies, you will need to survive, and family members in a 60 second rush through your randomly generated house.

PREPARE
for the worst. Don’t just grab arbitrary items, plan your survival and follow helpful tips from emergency broadcasts!

SURVIVE
in a fallout shelter with whatever you brought with you. How many days will you last? Will everyone make it out alive?

DECIDE
what to do, when the post-apocalyptic world pushes you to the corner. Will you risk going outside? Who is not eating dinner, when barely any food is left? How do you deal with a mutant cockroach infestation?

tw.description:
想像一個神奇的工廠正出現在您的客廳。精心策劃的傑作，在這裏，勤奮的工人將客戶想要的一切匯集在一起。可以用衆多不同的材料製造橡皮鴨和梳妝台、無人駕駛飛機和電吉他、踏板車和其他精美的商品，並以現金出售 – 您將現金投資回工廠，以獲得更多機器、更多工人並發展業務。您在Little Big Workshop中成為工廠大亨！

真正的工廠 - 充滿樂趣
您是大老闆，現在是時候負責您自己的桌面工廠了。組織工廠車間，管理您的工人，購買機械並設計高效的生產線 - 所有這些都在規定期限內完成，並讓您的客戶滿意！ 

開放式沙盒體驗
放輕鬆，這是一個沙盒體驗游戲，您可以在其中思考、衡量和鑽研事物，直到它們按照您想要的方式工作。當您生產超過50種獨特的產品類型（由多個零件和零件製成）時，向客戶和不斷變化的市場供應產品 - 所有這些都可以用不同的材料和生產方法來製造。沒有兩個工廠看起來相同。

小小手，大夢想
從一個小作坊開始，然後擴展到佈滿桌子的工廠。解鎖更先進的機器，增加更多的生產方法，還有最重要的，增加空間。很快，您將運行多條生產線，每天生產成百上千的先進產品，並欣喜地觀看可愛的工人完成實際工作。

特點：
- 各種各樣的行業和廣泛的產品
- 側重於實際問題，而不是價值、經濟或物流
- 在藍圖上組織生產的所有步驟
- 隨著您解鎖更多的辦公桌空間，工廠將發展
- 全面模擬的日/夜週期
- 照顧好您的工人！如果使他們太辛苦地工作，他們會像蒼蠅一樣墜落
- 可愛的模型城鎮藝術風格

advisories: 偶而/輕微的卡通或幻想暴力
tw.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

tw.releaseNotes: 我們會儘可能頻繁地更新應用程式，以使其更快、更可靠。
tw.description:
我的足跡MyTracks是一個使用GPS數據來追蹤您位置的應用程式。它非常適合各種活動，如徒步旅行、慢跑、散步、騎自行車等等。這款應用程式利用先進的技術提供精確的測量和計算。

以下是您可以使用MyTracks進行的操作：
追蹤您的路線：無論是徒步旅行、慢跑還是騎行，MyTracks都能夠記錄您的路徑並在地圖上顯示。
保存喜愛的位置：如果有特定地點您想要記住，您可以在應用程式中將其標記為喜愛的位置。
匯入和匯出數據：MyTracks允許您以CSV、GPX、KML和KMZ等多種格式匯入和匯出數據。
提高準確性：您可以進行靜態GPS觀測，以獲得更準確的路標。
輕鬆導航：該應用程式在指南針上提供路標導航，讓您輕鬆導航到指定位置。
可自訂的路標：您可以手動添加路標，或從喜愛的位置中導入路標。您甚至可以添加具有角度和距離的向量。
座標轉換：MyTracks允許您隨時在四種不同座標格式（十進制、度分秒、MGRS、UTM）之間進行轉換。
其他功能：該應用程式在錄製過程中顯示滑翔比，提供度數或千分度的指南針選項，支援地圖上的MGRS網格疊加，並允許您在開始追蹤之前創建路線。
詳細記錄：您可以在地圖上查看您的追蹤軌跡並重播路線。該應用程式提供有關您的軌跡的詳細統計信息，並顯示與每個追蹤相關的已保存路標。您還可以更改追蹤的顏色以便更容易識別。

請注意，持續在背景使用GPS會快速耗盡設備的電池。如果您喜歡我們的應用，請分享好友給予我們支持！如果您有任何回饋或問題，請隨時透過miaozhi.ai@gmail.com與我們聯繫。

「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

厭倦了一直重複輸入相同的響應？短語板通過易於訪問的短語對鍵盤進行自定義和分類。

添加一個類別和一些常用短語，您可以立即編輯，收聽和翻譯文本，然後在Facebook，Twitter，Instagram上共享它，或者僅通過電子郵件，LINE或SMS形式發送。

使用獨特的字體和顏色自定義您的短語和鍵盤！
超過100種創意字體可供選擇！
可以翻譯超過59種語言！

特徵：
•具有創意字體的全鍵盤。
•創建最常用的短語並按類別對其進行排序。
•在鍵盤上的任何應用程序中使用短語。
•更改短語的字體以匹配您選擇的外觀。*
•設計鍵盤樣式，包括按鈕和背景色。*
•將自定義照片設置為鍵盤背景。
•保存您的樣式，並在樣式管理器中從精選主題中進行選擇。
•選擇啟用的字體並管理其順序。
•更改鍵盤和按鈕的大小
•將您的短語翻譯成多種語言，然後直接在鍵盤中使用它們。*
•語音模式會大聲朗讀您的短語。*
•使用所有類型的表情符號來表達您的創造力。
•只需點擊一個按鈕即可發送快速回复。
•商業專業人員和社交媒體創作者的絕佳工具！

還：
•在任何應用程序中發送GIF和圖像。
•單擊即可共享您的位置。
•在各種字體之間切換而無需更改短語。*
•從大量字體中選擇。*
•自定義字體大小。*
•自定義字體顏色。*
•使用“安全”類別保護短語。
•使用短語面板小部件直接從通知中心添加短語。
•使用iCloud在所有設備中同步您的短語。
•直接在您喜歡的社交媒體應用（如Instagram，Facebook或Twitter）中使用。
•直接在iMessage，SMS或Apps中使用。
•創建自動回复文本，以幫助快速簡便地鍵入內容。
•使用短語快捷方式進行自信交流。

（*）需要有效的訂閱

記住：為了在鍵盤上顯示您的短語，您必須允許OPEN ACCESS。要允許它，請轉到設置>鍵盤，單擊短語面板，然後將開關打開。
（僅短語板需要開放訪問權限，才能在鍵盤上顯示您的自定義短語。我們從不保存或記錄您的任何擊鍵）。

短語板高級訂閱信息

加入Phraseboard Premium可以進行3天的免費試用，然後每月收取會員費。

•訂閱會自動續訂，除非在當前期間結束前至少24小時關閉了自動續訂功能。

•將在當前期間結束前的24小時內向帳戶收取續訂費用。

•訂閱可以由用戶管理，並且可以通過購買後轉到用戶的“帳戶設置”來關閉自動續訂。

•如果適用，則免費試用期中任何未使用的部分（如果提供）將在用戶購買訂閱時被沒收。

使用獨特的字體和顏色自定義您的短語和鍵盤！
超過100種創意字體可供選擇！
可以翻譯超過59種語言！

特徵：
•具有創意字體的全鍵盤。
•創建最常用的短語並按類別對其進行排序。
•在鍵盤上的任何應用程序中使用短語。
•更改短語的字體以匹配您選擇的外觀。*
•設計鍵盤樣式，包括按鈕和背景色。*

•保存您的樣式，並在樣式管理器中從精選主題中進行選擇。
•選擇啟用的字體並管理其順序。
•更改鍵盤和按鈕的大小
•將您的短語翻譯成多種語言，然後直接在鍵盤中使用它們。*
•語音模式會大聲朗讀您的短語。*
•使用所有類型的表情符號來表達您的創造力。
•只需點擊一個按鈕即可發送快速回复。
•商業專業人員和社交媒體創作者的絕佳工具！

還：
•在任何應用程序中發送GIF和圖像。
•單擊即可共享您的位置。
•在各種字體之間切換而無需更改短語。*
•從大量字體中選擇。*
•自定義字體大小。*
•自定義字體顏色。*
•使用“安全”類別保護短語。
•使用短語面板小部件直接從通知中心添加短語。
•使用iCloud在所有設備中同步您的短語。
•直接在您喜歡的社交媒體應用（如Instagram，Facebook或Twitter）中使用。
•直接在iMessage，SMS或Apps中使用。
•創建自動回复文本，以幫助快速簡便地鍵入內容。
•使用短語快捷方式進行自信交流。

（*）需要有效的訂閱

記住：為了在鍵盤上顯示您的短語，您必須允許OPEN ACCESS。要允許它，請轉到設置>鍵盤，單擊短語面板，然後將開關打開。
（僅短語板需要開放訪問權限，才能在鍵盤上顯示您的自定義短語。我們從不保存或記錄您的任何擊鍵）。

tw.description:
《鬼谷八荒》是一款開放世界的沙盒修仙遊戲。結合了修仙體系與山海經文化背景，體驗從凡人一步步修行成長為強者的過程，與山海經中各種妖、獸戰鬥。你是否能堅守本心，與困難做鬥爭；慎做抉擇，把握自己的命運。
【遁入修仙世界，開啟逆天人生】  
鬼谷八荒，除了財侶法地，還有詭祕莫測的妖獸，危機重重的秘境，難以逾越的天塹，彩光四射的祕寶，等著被人發現。  
你將作為一個煉氣期小修士從愚村出發，修煉，變強，危機中九死一生。每一次突破，你都能逆天改命，助你在旅途上披荊斬棘，跨越五大州，睥睨天下，再闖上天元山，向天道一問。  

【AI互動生態，給NPC完整的一生】  
我們構建了完整的NPC互動生態，他們「生活」在這裡，有自己的朋友親族關係網，自己的人生軌跡，不受玩家的進度限制，除非，你決定出手干涉。  
你可兼濟天下，攜手紅顏；你可獨善其身，快意恩仇；你亦可逆天而行，與全世界為敵。  
和NPC們切磋武藝，傳授道心，拜師學藝，收徒授業。和NPC在拍賣場喊價廝殺，結束後拔刀相向或順手牽羊。你將成為修仙界群像中的一部分，是大放異彩，還是默默修行，皆看你如何選擇。  

【體驗小說橋段，感受奇遇驚喜】  
英雄救美？愛人為你爭風吃醋？五十年之約？捲入神秘組織的明爭暗鬥？遺蹟遇寶？又慘遭奪寶？  
這些都有可能發生在你身上。  
除NPC交互之外，這裡還有豐富的隨機事件以及支線任務，在你的旅途上給予驚喜。它們或許會讓你煩惱，餵你刀子，也可能讓你化險為夷，甚至破而後立。在一步又一步的選擇過程中，你將譜寫只屬於你的，獨一無二的故事。  

【打造最強宗門，攻城略地一統八荒】  
我們構建了宗門的經營玩法，身為弟子、長老以及宗主，將會有不同的體驗。你可以加入大宗門，從最底層的弟子做起，一步步爬上權力的階梯。也可以空降落魄的小宗門，力挽狂瀾，帶領宗門重振雄風。  
弟子可以完成宗門任務，在宗門大比中出戰，或隨同門出征作戰，為宗門積累資源，為宗門贏取榮譽，為宗門擴張土地。  
長老可以管轄門下弟子，傳道授業，分配任務職能，加速宗門成長，在宗門大戰中指導弟子大殺四方。  
宗主則需要統籌全宗的秩序，制定侵略和防守計劃，攻防靈礦等資源點，甚至佔領他人宗門，奪取專屬逆天改命和祕籍。  
一統八荒，只要你有宏圖壯志和鐵腕手段，不再只是幻想。  

【構築獨特流派，挑戰妖獸神仙】  
闖蕩這世界，需要有傍身之技。  
心法築根基，武技/靈技探深淺，身法創機會，絕技造優勢，神通定乾坤。不同祕籍有不同的特性。  
修仙者還有十二大靈根，對應不同的流派，你可以選擇專精一路，或全面發展。十二種靈根都有對應的功法祕籍，排列組合可組成豐富的流派，孰強孰弱，皆由你評斷。  
城鎮琅琊閣、宗門功法閣、秘境、各種任務，甚至路邊一個土坑裡，都可能發現珍奇祕籍，充滿驚喜。  
這個世界上還有上百種珍奇妖獸，無數修仙者、鬼怪、仙人供你檢驗自己的實力。挑戰升仙擂台，衝擊各大洲參玄榜，以此證明自己的實力。你能否踏破冥山的障礙一路向前？構築的流派能否經歷大浪淘沙的檢驗？  

【法寶器靈煉丹畫符，三大神器伴前路】  
練好自身本領，也別忘了外力加持。  
開局三大神器，每一個都會給你帶來一種獨一無二的系統。雙魚佩可以復活自己和選中之人，昊天眼可以偷學妖獸技能，洞察更多訊息，而煉妖壺則可以讓你捕獲BOSS成為你的小跟班，替你戰鬥或派遣尋求寶物。  
除了開局神器之外，你也能煉製你自己的法寶，並收服器靈與你一起戰鬥，此外器靈還會在探索中給予你陪伴，觸發專屬的奇遇等等。  
在這裡，你還可以學習煉丹畫符、堪輿風水，製作幫助你探索世界、整蠱仇人、戰鬥殺敵的種種道具。至於如何發揮它們真正的作用，皆看各位道友如何抉擇。

Awards:
● 2021 BitSummit THE 8th BIT: Official Selection
● Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual
● Bahamut 2020 ACG Creation Contest: Bronze Award

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

Features:
● Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban
● 150 handcrafted rooms
● Fantasy themed pixel art
● Non-linear dungeon map

us.description:
60 Seconds! is a dark comedy atomic adventure of scavenge and survival. Collect supplies and rescue your family before the nuke hits. Stay alive in your fallout shelter. Make difficult decisions, ration food and hunt mutant cockroaches. And maybe survive. Or not.

60 Seconds! requires at least an iPhone 5, iPad 3, or iPad mini 2.

As Ted, a responsible citizen and a family man, you are faced with a slight disturbance to your happy, suburban lifestyle. THE NUCLEAR APOCALYPSE.

With only 60 seconds left to impact, guide Ted in a mad, intense and action packed dash through his house in search of his family and useful supplies. Everything will be against you - time, your very own furniture, the house that's different every time you play and the fundamental question - what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time and alive is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

EXPERIENCE
the suburbian nightmare of a nuke dropping down on your neighbourhood in this atomic, dark comedy set in 1950s.

SCAVENGE
any supplies, you will need to survive, and family members in a 60 second rush through your randomly generated house.

PREPARE
for the worst. Don’t just grab arbitrary items, plan your survival and follow helpful tips from emergency broadcasts!

SURVIVE
in a fallout shelter with whatever you brought with you. How many days will you last? Will everyone make it out alive?

DECIDE
what to do, when the post-apocalyptic world pushes you to the corner. Will you risk going outside? Who is not eating dinner, when barely any food is left? How do you deal with a mutant cockroach infestation?

us.description:
Imagine a magical factory, appearing right in your living room. A carefully planned masterpiece, where diligent workers throw together anything customers want. Rubber ducks and dressers, drones and electric guitars, scooters and other wonderful goods can be created from many different materials and sold for hard cash – cash you invest right back into your factory to get more machines, more workers and grow your business. In Little Big Workshop you become a factory tycoon!

Real factories - made FUN
You are the Big Boss and it’s time to take charge of your very own tabletop factory. Organize the factory floor, manage your workers, purchase machinery, and design efficient production lines - all within the time-limit and to your client's satisfaction! 

An open-ended sandbox-experience
Take it easy, it’s a sandbox-experience where you think, ponder and poke at things until you get it to work the way you’d like. Supply products to clients and an ever-changing market, as you produce over 50 unique product types, built from multiple parts and pieces - all of which can be created with different materials and production methods. No two factories should ever look the same.

Tiny hands, big dreams
Start out with just a small workshop and expand to a desk-filling factory. Unlock ever fancier machines, add even more production methods, and most of all, more room. Soon enough you’ll be running multiple production lines, producing hundreds of advanced products each day, and watching with joy as your cute workers do the actual work.

Features:
- Varying industries and a wide range of products
- Focus on practical problems, not on values, economics, or logistics
- Organize all steps of the production on a blueprint
- Factories grow as you unlock more desk space
- Fully simulated Day/Night-cycle
- Take care of your workers! Work them too hard and they drop like flies
- Cute model-town art-style

us.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

us.description:
MyTracks is an app that helps you keep track of your location using GPS data. It's perfect for various activities like hiking, running, walking, biking, and more. This app uses advanced technology to provide precise measurements and calculations.

Here's what you can do with MyTracks:
- Track your route: Whether you're hiking, running, or cycling, MyTracks can record your path and show it on a map.
- Save favorite locations: If there are specific places you want to remember, you can mark them as favorites in the app.
- Import and export data: MyTracks allows you to import and export data in various formats such as CSV, GPX, KML, and KMZ.
- Improve accuracy: You can take static GPS observations to get more accurate waypoints for your tracks.
- Easy navigation: The app provides a waypoint guide on the compass, making it easy for you to navigate to specific locations.
- Customizable waypoints: You can add waypoints manually or import them from your favorite locations. You can even add vectors with angle and distance.
- Coordinate conversion: MyTracks allows you to convert between four different coordinate formats (Decimal, DMS, MGRS, UTM) at any time.
- Additional features: The app displays glide ratio during recording, offers compass options in degrees or mils, supports MGRS Grid overlay on the map, and allows you to create routes to follow before starting your track.
- Detailed records: You can view your tracks on a map and replay the route. The app provides detailed statistics about your track and displays the saved waypoints associated with each track. You can also change the color of your tracks for easier identification.

Please note that using GPS continuously in the background can drain your device's battery quickly. If you have any feedback or questions, please feel free to contact us at miaozhi.ai@gmail.com

「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

us.trackCensoredName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
us.trackName: 生辰 — 桌面时间小组件
us.description:
这是一款关于生、死、心愿与延续的App。

小时候，我以为自己是不会老去的彼得·潘，却终究敌不过健康磨损，容颜老去。
时针转动，生命流逝，但每一次心跳都可以更加有力。

有时候，生命只是一连串的数字，多少年，多少月，多少小时，多少分钟。当你意识到这个时，往往陷入巨大的虚无感之中，惶恐不能自拔。
而现在，这些数字可以成为你重塑生命的坐标，指引你走向更健康、更长久的未来。

生辰 2.0 通过 AI 分析和科学判断，不仅预测生命的终点，更为你铺就延长生命的道路：

- 探索你的生命时钟：了解当下的预期寿命，直面生命的有限与珍贵。
- 发现延寿的可能：看见改变健康习惯能为你带来多少额外的生命时光。
- 聚合健康数据：自动追踪睡眠、锻炼、压力（HRV）、经期、喝水等十余种健康数据

美国诗人纳·斯待尔在87岁那年写道：
"如果我能够从头活过，我会试着犯更多的错。
我会放松一点，我会灵活一点。
我会爬更多的山，游更多的河，看更多的日落。"

因为了解生命的终点，才能更好地珍惜当下的每一刻。生辰2.0 探索健康的可能，让我们成为你健康旅程的长久伙伴。

【生辰 App 会员服务说明】

1.会员包含几种订购类型
订阅周期：1个月、3个月、12个月
2.首次订购后会通过iTunes账户直接支付；账户会在到期前24小时内扣费，扣费成功后自动顺延一个订阅周期
3.本服务由您自主选择是否续订，如需取消，请在订阅到期24小时前，在 AppleID 设置中取消
4.生辰App 会员协议
生辰App 会员服务协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-payment/

生辰 隐私协议：https://post.jellow.club/whatslife-privacy/

us.description:
RadarScope is an AMS-award-winning weather visualization tool that empowers meteorologists, public safety officials, storm spotters, and weather enthusiasts to view a full suite of single-site radar data and related severe weather products. Your initial purchase provides professional radar visualization in a fully native app, free from distracting and invasive practices, with optional subscription packages to add even more capabilities.

Whether you’re scanning for a mesocyclone’s tell-tale hook echo, pinpointing the landfall of a hurricane’s eye wall, or identifying velocity couplet, hail spike, or debris ball signatures, RadarScope displays native radar data in its original radial format. You see what the radar sees almost as soon as the radar sees it, with automatic updates every two to ten minutes depending on the radar’s scanning strategy.

Your initial app purchase includes the following:

• Full suite of single-site radar products for the US, Canada, Guam, Denmark, Finland, and Germany
• 6-frame radar loops
• Two built-in providers for radar data
• Tornado, thunderstorm, flash flood, special marine, snow squall, and extreme wind warnings in the US
• Selected severe weather warnings in Canada and Australia
• NWS-generated storm tracks with hail, TVS, and mesocyclone attributes
• Inspector and distance tools
• Color palette options for radar data
• AllisonHouse data plan integration
• Spotter Network integration for storm and location reporting
• mPING integration for submitting weather reports to NSSL
• Bundled maps with political boundaries, water bodies, and major highways, optimized for low-bandwidth use
• Support for widgets and complications
• Universal app for Apple platforms, including Apple Watch and Apple TV
• Family Sharing support

RadarScope Pro Tier One is an optional annual subscription that adds more features for tracking severe weather:

• 30-frame radar loops
• Cloud-to-ground lightning strikes
• Severe weather watches in the US and Canada
• Special weather statements in the US and Canada
• Mesoscale convective and precipitation discussions
• SPC convective, tornado, hail, wind, and fire outlooks
• WPC excessive rainfall outlooks in the US
• Local storm reports in the US
• Custom color palette support
• Multi-pane display (2 on phones; 4 on larger devices)
• Family Sharing support

RadarScope Pro Tier Two is an optional annual or monthly subscription that transforms RadarScope into a more complete visualization tool for a larger suite of weather products, including:

• Everything in Pro Tier One
• 50-frame radar loops
• A third provider for US radar data
• NEXRAD Level II radar data for the US with a 30-year historical archive
• Historical NEXRAD Level III, super-res, and non-US radar data with a 30-day archive
• Historical NWS bulletins with a 19-year archive
• GOES East and GOES West satellite products
• NSSL’s Multi-Radar Multi-Sensor (MRMS) products
• NCEP’s Real-Time Mesoscale Assimilation (RTMA) products
• Surface observations
• Atmospheric soundings in the US
• Hail size, hail probability, and azimuthal shear contours with a 30-day archive
• More detailed transportation and satellite imagery maps
• Custom color palette support for GOES, MRMS, and RTMA
• Server-sent events for radar and warning updates
• Cross-platform subscription sharing on up to 5 devices
• Family sharing support

If you choose to buy a RadarScope Pro subscription, it will be charged to your App Store account. The subscription will be auto-renewed within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period at the same price you originally paid. Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal disabled via your App Store account settings after the purchase. Once purchased, the subscription cannot be canceled during the active subscription period.

DTN is committed to safeguarding your privacy online. Our privacy policy is available for review at https://www.dtn.com/privacy-policy/

Please visit our web site for more information.

us.description:
Welcome to RadarOmega, the next-generation weather app that takes high-resolution weather data to a whole new level. More than just radar, RadarOmega provides unique data solutions for all types of weather data that are customizable depending on your needs, whether that's before, during, or after the storm.

Dedicated to providing solutions to our industry, RadarOmega created an exclusive network of weather stations featuring live video and sensor data called cyclonePORT. RadarOmega and cyclonePORT work closely with universities, emergency managers, broadcast meteorologists, and more to provide solutions for relaying critical weather information when life-threatening weather situations are imminent.

RadarOmega provides high-resolution radar data for the United States, Canada, Germany, Australia, and South Korea.

us.trackName: 鬼谷八荒 Tale of Immortal
us.description:
Tale of Immortal is an open-world sandbox based on Chinese mythology and cultivation. You will grow to become immortal, conquer the beasts from the Classic of Mountains and Season, make your choices carefully and grasp your own destiny.
【Ascend to the Top with Immortal Cultivation A Journey of a Lifetime】
Step into the enchanting world of the Tale of Immortal, where cultivation is an art that requires more than just financial means and help from fellow cultivators. To truly master it, one must possess a deep understanding of the craft and have access to the right cultivation venues. But that's not all—the journey is fraught with danger, as you'll face unpredictable monsters, crisis-ridden mystic realms, insurmountable barriers, and brilliant treasures waiting to be discovered.
【NPCs with a Life of Their Own AI-Driven Interactive Ecology】
Embrace a fully-realized NPC world, where each character is a unique entity with their own friends, family, and life trajectory— completely independent of your progress. However, if you choose to meddle, you certainly can!
【Surprising Encounters Await Experience a Fascinating Story】
Are you ready to embark on a thrilling adventure? One where you might become the hero who saves the day and wins the heart of the love of your life? Or maybe you're looking to stir up some jealousy in your crush and have them fight for your affection? How about fulfilling a fifty-year-old promise or getting caught up in the struggle of a mysterious organization? Perhaps you'll uncover a long-forgotten treasure, only to have it snatched away by a cunning adversary?
【From Conquering the Territories to Uniting the World Building the Strongest Sect】
Do you want to take your sect to new heights of power and glory? We've got the ultimate sect management gameplay that lets you experience the full range of sect life: from humble disciple to mighty sect master. Join a massive sect and work your way up from the bottom, or take on the challenge of leading a fallen sect back to prominence.
【Martial Arts, Monsters, and Immortals Building Your Unique School】
To embark on an epic adventure, you need to hone your skills and become a true warrior.

Start by building a solid foundation of cultivation. Your mind skills are crucial to success, so focus on cultivating a powerful mindset. From there, you can delve into martial and spiritual skills to take your abilities to the next level. As you explore, keep an eye out for opportunities to create edges with your motion and special skills. And don't forget to tap into your ultimate skills to save the day when necessary.
【The Triad of Power Artifact, Alchemy, and Talismans】
Sharpen your skills and harness the power of tools!

At the start, you get to choose from three formidable weapons, each offering a distinct cultivation system. The Bagua Jade grants you the ability to revive yourself and your chosen ally, the Eye of Providence allows you to steal Beast Skills and gain unparalleled insights into the world, and the Mythical Gourd empowers you to capture a Boss and enlist it as your loyal sidekick: command it to fight by your side or to search for treasure on your behalf.

Awards:

● Busan Indie Connect 2020: Excellence in Casual

About:
Dungeon and Puzzles is a game that challenges players' 2D spatial perception and logical thinking. A player can use a sword to attack monsters, or a bow and an arrow to destroy enemies from afar. Pushing the obstacles back with a shield and pulling the monsters with a pair of special gloves.

There are 150 handcrafted rooms in the dungeon. Players will have to get a better understanding of the game to solve the puzzles and clear the rooms.

To beat the puzzles with fewer moves, achieving advanced goals, players will have to try different tactics and move combinations to find an optimized solution for the room. Sometimes a player would need to put the old solution aside and take on a new perspective towards the problem, reexamine and rethink before making a move.

Features:
● Dungeon + Puzzle + Sokoban
● 150 handcrafted rooms
● Fantasy themed pixel art
● Non-linear dungeon map

tr.description:
60 Seconds! is a dark comedy atomic adventure of scavenge and survival. Collect supplies and rescue your family before the nuke hits. Stay alive in your fallout shelter. Make difficult decisions, ration food and hunt mutant cockroaches. And maybe survive. Or not.

60 Seconds! requires at least an iPhone 5, iPad 3, or iPad mini 2.

As Ted, a responsible citizen and a family man, you are faced with a slight disturbance to your happy, suburban lifestyle. THE NUCLEAR APOCALYPSE.

With only 60 seconds left to impact, guide Ted in a mad, intense and action packed dash through his house in search of his family and useful supplies. Everything will be against you - time, your very own furniture, the house that's different every time you play and the fundamental question - what to take with you and who to leave behind?

Reaching the fallout shelter in time and alive is only the beginning. Whatever you scavenged and whoever you saved will play a vital role in your survival. Each survival story will be different, with every day surprising you with unexpected events. Will all of these stories end well? It's up to you. Ration food and water, make best use of your supplies, face difficult choices and even venture into the wasteland.

Good luck.

EXPERIENCE
the suburbian nightmare of a nuke dropping down on your neighbourhood in this atomic, dark comedy set in 1950s.

SCAVENGE
any supplies, you will need to survive, and family members in a 60 second rush through your randomly generated house.

PREPARE
for the worst. Don’t just grab arbitrary items, plan your survival and follow helpful tips from emergency broadcasts!

SURVIVE
in a fallout shelter with whatever you brought with you. How many days will you last? Will everyone make it out alive?

DECIDE
what to do, when the post-apocalyptic world pushes you to the corner. Will you risk going outside? Who is not eating dinner, when barely any food is left? How do you deal with a mutant cockroach infestation?

tr.description:
Imagine a magical factory, appearing right in your living room. A carefully planned masterpiece, where diligent workers throw together anything customers want. Rubber ducks and dressers, drones and electric guitars, scooters and other wonderful goods can be created from many different materials and sold for hard cash – cash you invest right back into your factory to get more machines, more workers and grow your business. In Little Big Workshop you become a factory tycoon!

Real factories - made FUN
You are the Big Boss and it’s time to take charge of your very own tabletop factory. Organize the factory floor, manage your workers, purchase machinery, and design efficient production lines - all within the time-limit and to your client's satisfaction! 

An open-ended sandbox-experience
Take it easy, it’s a sandbox-experience where you think, ponder and poke at things until you get it to work the way you’d like. Supply products to clients and an ever-changing market, as you produce over 50 unique product types, built from multiple parts and pieces - all of which can be created with different materials and production methods. No two factories should ever look the same.

Tiny hands, big dreams
Start out with just a small workshop and expand to a desk-filling factory. Unlock ever fancier machines, add even more production methods, and most of all, more room. Soon enough you’ll be running multiple production lines, producing hundreds of advanced products each day, and watching with joy as your cute workers do the actual work.

Features:
- Varying industries and a wide range of products
- Focus on practical problems, not on values, economics, or logistics
- Organize all steps of the production on a blueprint
- Factories grow as you unlock more desk space
- Fully simulated Day/Night-cycle
- Take care of your workers! Work them too hard and they drop like flies
- Cute model-town art-style

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Cartoon or Fantasy Violence
tr.description:
Atomic Space Age was a blast! Until it became the Post-Apocalyptic Space Age.

Your space station is about to explode and you only have 60 seconds before things get messy. What (or who) will you grab before you make a mad dash for the emergency shuttle and begin your journey into THE GREAT UNKNOWN?

This is 60 Parsecs!, a dark comedy sci-fi adventure set in the Atomic Space Age - complete with all the Cold War paranoia, chrome-plated wall accents and cockroaches with space helmets.

Lead a crew of woefully unprepared astronauts, equipped with whatever junk - sorry - "supplies" you can grab before blasting off, on a journey across the cosmos that's best described as misguided. Make the best of it, while dealing with soup shortages and other horrors of outer space. Will you have what it takes to find a new home and survive?

Bon voyage!


SCAVENGE & EVACUATE
With only 60 seconds before nukes reduce the space station to floating particles in the vacuum of space, frantically grab whatever supplies and crew you can before getting out of there. You never know when that sock puppet will come in handy.

SURVIVE & DECIDE
Space funerals are inconvenient, so try to avoid dying where possible. Use your limited supplies and (hopefully not limited) wits to make difficult choices and ensure your survival, even though the odds are definitely stacked against you.

EXPLORE & CRAFT
Duct tape fixes all problems, but how do you fix (or at least craft) duct tape? Chart expeditions to find resources, craft survival essentials and explore strange new worlds in a procedural, very-much-permadeath adventure.

LEAD & PROTECT
As captain, it's your duty to keep the crew happy - they're less likely to kill you that way. Manage relationships as you watch them grow closer and hopefully not throw each other out the airlock.

Keep the words, pictures, videos, voice and positions you want to record at any time and anywhere.
And there are reminders that you can never forget.

tr.description:
MyTracks is an app that helps you keep track of your location using GPS data. It's perfect for various activities like hiking, running, walking, biking, and more. This app uses advanced technology to provide precise measurements and calculations.

Here's what you can do with MyTracks:
- Track your route: Whether you're hiking, running, or cycling, MyTracks can record your path and show it on a map.
- Save favorite locations: If there are specific places you want to remember, you can mark them as favorites in the app.
- Import and export data: MyTracks allows you to import and export data in various formats such as CSV, GPX, KML, and KMZ.
- Improve accuracy: You can take static GPS observations to get more accurate waypoints for your tracks.
- Easy navigation: The app provides a waypoint guide on the compass, making it easy for you to navigate to specific locations.
- Customizable waypoints: You can add waypoints manually or import them from your favorite locations. You can even add vectors with angle and distance.
- Coordinate conversion: MyTracks allows you to convert between four different coordinate formats (Decimal, DMS, MGRS, UTM) at any time.
- Additional features: The app displays glide ratio during recording, offers compass options in degrees or mils, supports MGRS Grid overlay on the map, and allows you to create routes to follow before starting your track.
- Detailed records: You can view your tracks on a map and replay the route. The app provides detailed statistics about your track and displays the saved waypoints associated with each track. You can also change the color of your tracks for easier identification.

Please note that using GPS continuously in the background can drain your device's battery quickly. If you have any feedback or questions, please feel free to contact us at miaozhi.ai@gmail.com

Filca is SLR Film Camera

@veteranUser

Master your shots with Filca's expert-level manual controls.

「Card.Note」：每个念头都值得用心记录

这是一款以卡片为主要设计理念的极简记事 App 。
你写的每一段文字都可以生成一张张精美的卡片 。

你可以用它来写诗、短文、随想； 
也可以用它来写日记、清单、规划、要事提醒；
还可以直接用语音输入来记录每个瞬间的念头。

「Card.Note」九大特点：

1.极简设计
循着极简的设计理念，结合图标及手势操作，轻松上手。

2.全局卡片化
充分融入了卡片设计理念，可根据喜好随意切换横版或竖版两种卡片笔记显示样式。

3.全局手势化
下拉可新建笔记，再下拉可保存笔记，右滑可呼出作品集，长按卡片可预览卡片内容。

4.语音录入
打开便可直接语音输入，随时记录每个灵光显现的想法。你可以把它当作成iOS文艺版“闪念胶囊”。

5.要事提醒：
可设置提醒闹种，重要事情和计划不再错失。

6.快捷高效
支持3D-Touch及Widget小组件功能，可直接在应用图标或Widget快速打开应用或直接进入创建笔记界面，让你随时高效地记录每个念头。

7.文青定制
精选了 10 款记事字体及 9 种文青主题色卡、多达 100 种不同颜色的色卡，可根据喜好定制各种卡片。

8.iCloud云同步
支持iCloud云同步，多台设备间数据可任意同步。

9.深色模式
全局适配深色模式，视觉舒适不刺眼。

感谢下载，生活愉快。

如有问题或建议，请联系开发者
微博：PoPoem开发者
邮箱：yande18@126.com

tr.description:
8mm is so realistic it was even used to film scenes in the Oscar-winning documentary Searching for Sugar Man!

We have established the de facto standard of real-time retro film emulation. It was featured by Apple in App of the Day, App of the Week, In the Director's Chair, App Store Essentials, etc.

8mm Vintage Camera captures the beauty and magic of old-school vintage movies right through your viewfinder. Dust and scratches, retro colors, flickering, light leaks, and even frame shake, all can be instantly added with a single tap of the finger.

SHOOT BOTH PHOTOS AND VIDEOS WITH SOPHISTICATED LIVE EFFECTS

• Combine effects of film color, halation, dust & scratch, film grain, and softening to create authentic old-school movies
• Adjust the strength of the effects to achieve your own unique visual style
• 10 Lenses (frame) effects: Projector, Vignetting, Light Leak, Color Fringing, Super 8, Screen, 16mm, Tube, color negatives of Super 8 and 16mm
• 21 Retro & Aged Films: 1920, Noir, 60s, 70s, Sakura, XPro, Siena, Pela, Indigo, Tuscan, Two-Color, 2-Strip, 3X, and monochromes
• Additional 21 filters that emulate real historical films and expired films - available with the 8mm Pro subscription
• Jitter Button to imitate real 8mm projectors frame shakes
• Sound Switch to add projector sound for extra authenticity or mute the video for a silent movie effect.
• Up to 4K 30fps with original unfiltered video recording on newer devices

A COMPACT EDITOR FOR MOVIE CREATION

- Apply film and frame effects to clips
- Trim video, pan & zoom photo
- Add a soundtrack from your music library
- Choose from 5 unique themes with matching titles, transitions

8MM PRO SUBSCRIPTION

- You can subscribe or make a one-time purchase for unlimited access to all current filters and future updates
- Start your subscription with a free 7-day trial. Once the trial is over, you’ll be charged an annual subscription fee
- Your subscription will automatically renew unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period. You can go to your Settings > Apple ID > Subscriptions to turn auto-renew off

tr.description:
MoneyTrack - Streamlined Personal Finance Tracker

Track every penny, master your financial freedom. A pure expense tracking app with no ads, no splash screens, and no investment promotions.

■ CORE FEATURES
• Auto-Tracking: Deep integration with Shortcuts allows automatic expense recording triggered by your transactions
• Comprehensive Entries: Support for income, expenses, reimbursements, transfers, credit card payments, installments, and debt management
• Insightful Analytics: Visualize spending patterns with pie charts, bar graphs and trend lines to quickly identify financial issues
• Precise Budgeting: Set annual/monthly budgets for total spending and categories with dynamic daily budget adjustments

■ COMPLETE ASSET MANAGEMENT
• Unified management of multiple account types (cash, bank cards, credit cards, store cards)
• Balance sheet and asset curve for real-time financial status tracking
• Credit card management system (payment reminders, limit management, interest-free period calculation)
• Multi-currency asset recording with support for all major currency exchange rates

■ THOUGHTFUL FUNCTIONS
• Multiple Ledgers: Flexibly separate different financial records
• Shared Accounting: Invite family and friends to maintain transparent shared finances
• Cloud Backup: Free data synchronization across devices with secure protection
• Flexible Import/Export: Support for importing data from multiple platforms and exporting in Excel format
• Recurring Entries: Customisable automatic entry tasks that generate transactions on schedule
• Installment Tracking: Easily monitor payment schedules and receive timely reminders
• Sub-Categories: Unlimited categorisation options to meet personalised needs

■ CROSS-PLATFORM EXPERIENCE
Synchronise across iPhone, iPad and PC with real-time updates, recording every expenditure wherever you are.

■ FOCUSED ON FINANCE MANAGEMENT
We do one thing only — help you better manage your personal finances. No investment promotions, no community distractions, just a pure and efficient expense tracking experience.

tr.trackName: 鬼谷八荒 Tale of Immortal
tr.description:
Tale of Immortal is an open-world sandbox based on Chinese mythology and cultivation. You will grow to become immortal, conquer the beasts from the Classic of Mountains and Season, make your choices carefully and grasp your own destiny.
【Ascend to the Top with Immortal Cultivation A Journey of a Lifetime】
Step into the enchanting world of the Tale of Immortal, where cultivation is an art that requires more than just financial means and help from fellow cultivators. To truly master it, one must possess a deep understanding of the craft and have access to the right cultivation venues. But that's not all—the journey is fraught with danger, as you'll face unpredictable monsters, crisis-ridden mystic realms, insurmountable barriers, and brilliant treasures waiting to be discovered.
【NPCs with a Life of Their Own AI-Driven Interactive Ecology】
Embrace a fully-realized NPC world, where each character is a unique entity with their own friends, family, and life trajectory— completely independent of your progress. However, if you choose to meddle, you certainly can!
【Surprising Encounters Await Experience a Fascinating Story】
Are you ready to embark on a thrilling adventure? One where you might become the hero who saves the day and wins the heart of the love of your life? Or maybe you're looking to stir up some jealousy in your crush and have them fight for your affection? How about fulfilling a fifty-year-old promise or getting caught up in the struggle of a mysterious organization? Perhaps you'll uncover a long-forgotten treasure, only to have it snatched away by a cunning adversary?
【From Conquering the Territories to Uniting the World Building the Strongest Sect】
Do you want to take your sect to new heights of power and glory? We've got the ultimate sect management gameplay that lets you experience the full range of sect life: from humble disciple to mighty sect master. Join a massive sect and work your way up from the bottom, or take on the challenge of leading a fallen sect back to prominence.
【Martial Arts, Monsters, and Immortals Building Your Unique School】
To embark on an epic adventure, you need to hone your skills and become a true warrior.

Start by building a solid foundation of cultivation. Your mind skills are crucial to success, so focus on cultivating a powerful mindset. From there, you can delve into martial and spiritual skills to take your abilities to the next level. As you explore, keep an eye out for opportunities to create edges with your motion and special skills. And don't forget to tap into your ultimate skills to save the day when necessary.
【The Triad of Power Artifact, Alchemy, and Talismans】
Sharpen your skills and harness the power of tools!

At the start, you get to choose from three formidable weapons, each offering a distinct cultivation system. The Bagua Jade grants you the ability to revive yourself and your chosen ally, the Eye of Providence allows you to steal Beast Skills and gain unparalleled insights into the world, and the Mythical Gourd empowers you to capture a Boss and enlist it as your loyal sidekick: command it to fight by your side or to search for treasure on your behalf.
